although I myself have the whole friends series ripped I dont think I will up it any time soon if at all.

although what I do is no secret and I once like you was stressed not being able to find the best solution, so here is what I do, its very simple.

download
Magic dvdripper - http://www.magicdvdripper.com/
well worth what ever I paid for it. or if you are cheap you know how to get it.

Is is the best ripper ive ever used, rip with the setting of original MPEG2. that will give you a video file of the original video on the dvd. then I compress that to give the best quality.

then download autogk - http://www.autogk.me.uk/

its freeware so no need to look for anything else. Import the original mpeg2 you ripped and compress, this is the best xvid compressor ive used and pretty sure what 99% of the videos you download are from.

and that's basically it. Enjoy backing up your dvds its nice :P
